forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 63F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Locally heavier rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Locally heavier rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind with thunderstorms likely by morning. Low 9C. WSW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Locally heavier rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. Thunderstorms possible...mainly late. Low 48F. WSW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Locally heavier rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 60F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 64F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 66F. Winds light and variable.
